reviewText:
Playboy - Fast Women is fifty-three minutes long and not the one hour is says on the box. The video features seven Playmates and eight non-Playmates. The ladies are featured in seven segments. Since I have a hard time telling Kim and Victoria apart, I may have gotten them mixed up in their segments. Priscilla Taylor and Jami Ferrell appear on the cover of the box.

Jennifer Allan-Playboy Playmate of the Month for September 1996
Jami Ferrell-Playboy Playmate of the Month for January 1997 & Germany's Playmate of the Month for January 1997
Victoria Fuller-Playboy Playmate of the Month for January 1996
Christina Leardini-Playboy Playmate of the Month for April 1991
Jessica Lee-Playboy Playmate of the Month for August 1996
Priscilla Taylor-Playboy Playmate of the Month for March 1996
Kimber West-Playboy Playmate of the Month February 1997 & Germany's Playmate of the Month for January 1998

Jessica\Easy Score-Starts off with the couple riding a motor cycle and having sex. Jessica is topless on the motorcycle. Jessica is nude in the bedroom scene.
Jami, Kimber, & Priscilla\Hot Wheels-All three ladies are fully nude 65% of the time.
Broad Sided-Four ladies are having sex with a guy in the desert. Three of the ladies are topless and one is nude.
Jennifer\Convertible Assists-Jennifer strips down to full nudity in the convertible. This segment would be later seen in Playboy Video Playmate Calendar 1998.
Kimber & Victoria\Jet Setters-Kimber is shown more often in the nude the Victoria.
Priscilla, Jessica, Jami & Kim\New Models-Full nudity most of the time
Christina\Calculated Risks-Christina is fully nude 35% of the time.

I did like the majority of the video; even when six of the ladies are defining what a Fast Women is. Playboy - Fast Women gets an AAA+++.
